actions.follow_lure: Register or sign in and you can subscribe to this category.

about_answeropedia.text: Answeropedia is like Wikipedia, only for questions and answers. You ask a question and get one complete, comprehensive and competent answer from the community.
about_answeropedia.title: About Answeropedia

sign_up.text: Answeropedia is a wiki-based site where users can ask questions, respond to them and supplement other people’s answers.
sign_up.title: Sign up

find_your_first_friends.msg: Find and subscribe to three interesting users. Questions, answers and other activities of these users will appear in your news feed.
find_your_first_friends.title: Find your first friends

follow_some_questions.msg: By subscribing to interesting questions, you can follow their edits. Find and subscribe to three or more questions.
follow_some_questions.title: Follow some questions

set_real_name.msg: A real name is more credible than @username . It will be shown next to your edits and in the TOP authors.
set_real_name.title: Set real name

set_signature.msg: The signature describes your professional skills and knowledge. It will appear next to the edits of the answers you make.
set_signature.title: Set signature

subscribe_to_several_categories.msg: Select and subscribe to three topics close to you. Questions on these topics will appear in your news feed.
subscribe_to_several_categories.title: Subscribe to several categories

write_the_first_answer.msg: Look at the questions that no one else has written an answer and become the first author.
write_the_first_answer.title: Write the first answer

flow.note: Questions and answers flow on Answeropedia.

note.code_licensed: Code licensed MIT, answers CC BY SA 4.0.
note.designed_and_built: Designed and built with ♥ by the Answeropedia team with the help of our contributors.

how_it_works.step_1_msg: You ask a question about any category of interest to you.
how_it_works.step_2_msg: We find a specialist who can give a competent answer.
how_it_works.step_3_msg: You receive one complete, comprehensive and competent answer.
how_it_works.title: How it works

jumbotron.text: Answeropedia is like Wikipedia, only for questions and answers.

share_link.note: You can help the Answeropedia project by simply sharing your link with your friends.
share_link.title: Share link

main.slogan: Ask a question and get one complete answer

ask.note: Ask questions in a form understandable to real people - they will answer, not search robots.
ask.title: New question

category_rename.note: Before renaming a category, please review the basic rules for renaming.
category_rename.title: Rename category

question_rename.note: Before you rename a question, please read the basic rules for renaming
question_rename.title: Rename question

signup.note: By signing up, you agree to our terms of use, privacy policy, and cookie policy.
signup.title: Sign up

block__categories.no_categories: The question has no categories yet.
block__categories.title: Categories

block__contributors.msg: Authors of the answer are users who wrote the first or added to an existing answer. Other types of contributions to answering questions are also taken into account.

question.email_notification_msg: Enter your email address to get notified about the answer as soon as it appears

lure_be_first_contributor.message: Still no one tried to write an answer to this question. Be the first if the category of the question is close to you!
lure_be_first_contributor.title: Be the first author

lure_edit_answer.msg: Register or log in and you can edit or supplement this question.

lure_first_answer.msg: Register or log in and you will be the first to write the answer to this question.

lure_follow_question.msg: Register or sign in and you can subscribe to this question.

question.share_link__description: Wiki-answers to your questions on Answeropedia

about_block.msg_1: The sandbox is a place to get new questions that have not yet been answered.
about_block.msg_2: As soon as the question has a comprehensive answer and several categories, it is transferred to the main list.
about_block.title: What is a «sandbox»?

search.no_questions_found_msg: On request "%query%" could not find any questions

no_users_found.msg: On request "%query%" could not find any users
no_users_found.title: No users found

settings.avatar__note: It is advisable to use your real photo as an avatar - this causes more confidence among users.
settings.real_name_note: The real name causes more trust than @username. It will be shown next to your edits and in the Top authors.
settings.signature_note: Enter a signature describing your professional skills and knowledge.
settings.signature_placeholder: For example: Professor of Psychology, entrepreneur, novice poet
settings.site_note: Enter the address of your website or page on the social network.
settings.title: Settings

alert__name.msg: Enter your real name. It is more trustworthy and will appear next to your edits.

alert__signature.msg: Enter a signature describing your professional skills and knowledge.

actions.follow_lure: Register or sign in and you can subscribe to this user.

no_answers.msg: User has not written any answers yet.

users.new_users_msg: New users from around the world
users.title: Contributors
